#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, p, i, a, b, ct;

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d %d", &n, &p );

		vector<int> deg( n + 1, 0 );

		while( p-- ) {

			scanf("%d %d", &a, &b );
			deg[ a ]++;
			deg[ b ]++;
		}

		for( i = 1, ct = 0;i <= n;i++ ) {

			if( deg[ i ] & 0x1 )
				ct++;
		}

		if( ( ct == 0 ) || ( ct == 2 ) )
			printf("Possible\n");
		else
			printf("Not Possible\n"); 
	}

	return 0;
}
